_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Mumble Server
author: panel@example.com
description:
Mumble is an open source, low-latency, high quality voice chat software primarily intended for use
while gaming.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server/
fi

cd /mnt/server

FILE=/mnt/server/murmur.ini
if [ -f "$FILE" ]; then
    echo "Config file already exists."
else 
    echo "Downloading the config file."
    apk add --no-cache murmur
    cp /etc/murmur.ini /mnt/server/murmur.ini
    apk del murmur
fi
echo "done"

variables.name: Maximum Users
variables.description: Maximum concurrent users on the mumble server.
